name: sfchronicle
text:
A’s pitching coach Scott Emerson talks to @susanslusser about Frankie Montas, A.J. Puk, recent Rule 5 acquisitions, and everything else Oakland fans need to know about A’s pitching in 2021.
https://t.co/1pUqauN7GE

name: sfchronicle
text:
Officials at San Quentin State Prison began a series of mandatory transfers, which some medical personnel resisted and labeled as hasty, ill-advised and fraught with risk.
https://t.co/jVwWcpc7Zv
